title: Griddled lamb chops with pine nuts and pomegranate tabbouleh
description: Jame Martin works his magic on these lamb chops brushing them with oil-dipped rosemary. Served with spicy tabbouleh.
ingredients: 2 red chillies, seeds removed, roughly chopped
2 tbsp olive oil or rapeseed oil
½ bunch fresh mint, roughly chopped
½ bunch fresh coriander, roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ bunch rosemary, tied with string
